name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.16.5-4f9c33f54667e9d9faed3d925b5517bc28b0bdbe "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
